title: The Foot
description: A young couple seeks shelter for the night in an abandoned home. They soon realize something weird is afoot and this house holds a sinister secret.
parent: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules
altHero: a severed foot sticks its pinkie toe into the nose of a screaming woman
alt1: a menacing oil portrait of a man with wild hair
alt2: a severed foot walks across the floor of an old house
alt3: a young man and woman explore an old house by candlelight
alt4: a woman’s two feet and one man’s foot stick out the end of bedsheets
